channel.title: Update
channel.description: Seems they're adding a pet jad. Doesn't near reality have that or something? They're stealing from us :'(

item.title: Update
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:44, topic:411720”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=512974.msg3731098#msg3731098 date=1314635311]

Honestly, summoning was in RSPS before it was on Runescape.

gimme a source link to one that has summoning, that was made before summoning was added to runescape.

This was a long, long time ago. People will vouch hopefully.

I’ve never really seen those, I do remember when people played rsps for the customs and not to just get away from rs.
[/quote]
Some would just be that it would be in the music interface, you click a monster name, it spawns it, you get exp.[/quote]

rsps have come a long way.

Read full topic

item.title: Update
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:34, topic:411720”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=512974.msg3724705#msg3724705 date=1314188133]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Exjjmi-BHvg

New pet thing

Cool :p, I didn’t know you needed 99 summoning and a fire cape to wear that… Shit.

You need 99 summoning, 99 slayer, 100 zeal, and pay a fire cape.

How long does Pet Jad stay out for?
[/quote]

As long as you want it, since it’s a pet. It doesn’t require feeding and it never runs away. Probably has baller dialog, too.[/quote]
Talk to Pet Jad
“bi tch get me a cookie”

Read full topic
